review.description: I had take out of the Appetizers & Entree combo - Ka-Chori and Chicken Korma, which also included basmoti rice, nan bread, cucumber, rayta (yogurt) & mango chutney.  The Korma and nan were very good.  I had not tried this app dish before and while it was good the other items were better.  I definitely plan to go go back and try other dishes.
review.author: San C.
